author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: بما اصطفاك بين بريّته وجعلك سلطانا للمسلمين، وينبغي لك بأن تعرف قدر ما وهبك الله من بدايع جوده وإحسانه وتشكره في كلّ حين، وشكرك ربّك هو حبّك أحبّاءه وحفظك عباده وصيانتهم عن هؤلاء الخائنين، لئلاّ يظلمهم أحد ثمّ إجراء حكم الله بينهم لتكون في شرع الله لمن الرّاسخين، وإنّك
translation: Render thanks unto God for having chosen thee out of the whole world, and made thee king over them that profess thy faith. It well beseemeth thee to appreciate the wondrous favors with which God hath favored thee, and to magnify continually His name. Thou canst best praise Him if thou lovest His loved ones, and dost safeguard and protect His servants from the mischief of the treacherous, that none may any longer oppress them. Thou shouldst, moreover, arise to enforce the law of God amongst them, that thou mayest be of those who are firmly established in His law.
